title: Create minimal graph viewer in frontend using Cytoscape.js
goal: Visualize the memory blocks and their connections as an interactive graph in the UI.
action_items: [ ] Add `cytoscape.js` library to the frontend project.
[ ] Create a new page or component in the frontend for the graph view.
[ ] Fetch the graph data from the `/api/graph` endpoint (Task 6.3).
[ ] Initialize a Cytoscape instance with the fetched node and edge data.
[ ] Apply basic styling (e.g., different colors/shapes for nodes based on `type`).
test_criteria: Navigate to the graph viewer page in the frontend UI.
Verify that a graph is rendered.
Verify that nodes and edges correspond to the memory blocks and links in Dolt.
Verify nodes are styled differently based on their type.
